018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi;
019
020import static java.lang.Character.isWhitespace;
021import static java.util.Locale.ROOT;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec.LEAD_IN;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal.Commons.retrieveMessage;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.USAGE;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
029
030import java.util.Optional;
031
032import org.apiguardian.api.API;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CmdLineException;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.CmdLineValueHandler;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Message;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Translation;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils;
039
040/**
041 *  Base class for the run-time copies of the
042 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option &#64;Option} or
043 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument &#64;Argument}
044 *  annotation. By definition, unnamed options are arguments, and named options
045 *  are <i>real</i> command line options.
046 *
047 *  @see CLIOptionDefinition
048 *  @see CLIArgumentDefinition
049 *
050 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
051 *  @thanks Mark Sinke
052 *  @version $Id: CLIDefinition.java 938 2021-12-15 14:42:53Z tquadrat $
053 *  @since 0.0.1
054 *
055 *  @UMLGraph.link
056 */
057@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CLIDefinition.java 938 2021-12-15 14:42:53Z tquadrat $" )
058@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
059public abstract class CLIDefinition
060{
061        /*-----------*\
062    ====** Constants **========================================================
063        \*-----------*/
064    /**
065     *  The message indicating that the empty String is not allowed as an
066     *  option name.
067     */
068    @SuppressWarnings( "SimplifiableAnnotation" )
069    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
070    @Message
071    (
072        description = "The message indicating that the empty String is not allowed as an option name.",
073        translations =
074        {
075            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The empty String is not a valid option name" )
076        }
077    )
078    public static final int MSGKEY_EmptyIsInvalid = 31;
079
080    /**
081     *  The message indicating an invalid option name.
082     */
083    @SuppressWarnings( "SimplifiableAnnotation" )
084    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
085    @Message
086    (
087        description = "The message indicating an invalid option name.",
088        translations =
089        {
090            @Translation( language = "en", text = "'%1$s' is not a valid option name" )
091        }
092    )
093    public static final int MSGKEY_InvalidName = 32;
094
095    /**
096     *  The message indicating that the option name is reserved.
097     */
098    @SuppressWarnings( "SimplifiableAnnotation" )
099    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
100    @Message
101    (
102        description = "The message indicating that the option name is reserved.",
103        translations =
104        {
105            @Translation( language = "en", text = "'%1$s' is a reserved name" )
106        }
107    )
108    public static final int MSGKEY_ReservedName = 33;
109
110    /**
111     *  The message indicating a whitespace character as option name.
112     */
113    @SuppressWarnings( "SimplifiableAnnotation" )
114    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
115    @Message
116    (
117        description = "The message indicating a whitespace character as option name.",
118        translations =
119        {
120            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Character after '%s' may not be whitespace" )
121        }
122    )
123    public static final int MSGKEY_Whitespace1 = 34;
124
125    /**
126     *  The message indicating a whitespace character as part of an option
127     *  name.
128     */
129    @SuppressWarnings( "SimplifiableAnnotation" )
130    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
131    @Message
132    (
133        description = "The message indicating a whitespace character as part of an option name.",
134        translations =
135        {
136            @Translation( language = "en", text = "An option name may not contain any whitespace characters" )
137        }
138    )
139    public static final int MSGKEY_Whitespace2 = 35;
140
141    /**
142     *  The message indicating an invalid lead-in for an option name.
143     */
144    @SuppressWarnings( "SimplifiableAnnotation" )
145    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
146    @Message
147    (
148        description = "The message indicating an invalid lead-in for an option name.",
149        translations =
150        {
151            @Translation( language = "en", text = "The name '%2$s' must start with '%1$s'" )
152        }
153    )
154    public static final int MSGKEY_WrongLeadIn = 36;
155
156    /**
157     *  <p>{@summary The format for the default usage keys.}</p>
158     *  <p>The resource bundle key for a
159     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse#USAGE USAGE}
160     *  text is prepended with the name of the class that defines it.</p>
161     */
162    public static final String USAGE_KEY_FORMAT = StringUtils.format( "%%s.%s_%%s", USAGE.name() );
163
164        /*------------*\
165    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
166        \*------------*/
167    /**
168     *  The optional format string.
169     */
170    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
171    private final Optional<String> m_Format;
172
173    /**
174     *  The handler that is used to parse and store the option or argument
175     *  value.
176     */
177    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
178    private final CmdLineValueHandler<?> m_Handler;
179
180    /**
181     *  {@code true} if this is an argument, {@code false} if it is
182     *  an option.
183     */
184    private final boolean m_IsArgument;
185
186    /**
187     *  {@code true} if the target property is multi-valued,
188     *  {@code false} otherwise.
189     */
190    private final boolean m_IsMultiValued;
191
192    /**
193     *  {@code true} if the option or argument is required,
194     *  {@code false} otherwise.
195     */
196    private final boolean m_IsRequired;
197
198    /**
199     *  The name of the meta variable that is used in examples.
200     */
201    private final String m_MetaVar;
202
203    /**
204     *  The name of the property.
205     */
206    private final String m_Property;
207
208    /**
209     *  The usage text.
210     */
211    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
212    private final Optional<String> m_Usage;
213
214    /**
215     *  The resource key for the usage text.
216     */
217    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
218    private final Optional<String> m_UsageKey;
219
220        /*--------------*\
221    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
222        \*--------------*/
223    /**
224     *  Creates a new {@code CLIDefinition} instance.
225     *
226     *  @param  property    The name of the property.
227     *  @param  isArgument  {@code true} for an argument,
228     *      {@code false} for an option.
229     *  @param  usage   The usage text.
230     *  @param  usageKey    The resource bundle key for the usage text.
231     *  @param  metaVar The meta variable name.
232     *  @param  required    {@code true} if the argument or option is
233     *      mandatory.
234     *  @param  handler The handler for the option or argument value.
235     *  @param  multiValued {@code true} if the option or argument allows
236     *      more than one value.
237     *  @param  format  The optional format.
238     */
239    protected CLIDefinition( final String property, final boolean isArgument, final String usage, final String usageKey, final String metaVar, final boolean required, final CmdLineValueHandler<?> handler, final boolean multiValued, final String format )
240    {
241        m_Property = requireNotEmptyArgument( property, "property" );
242        m_IsArgument = isArgument;
243        m_Usage = Optional.ofNullable( usage );
244        m_UsageKey = Optional.ofNullable( usageKey );
245        m_MetaVar = nonNull( metaVar ) ? metaVar :  property.toUpperCase( ROOT );
246        m_IsRequired = required;
247        m_Handler = requireNonNullArgument( handler, "handler" );
248        m_Handler.setContext( this );
249        m_IsMultiValued = multiValued;
250        m_Format = Optional.ofNullable( format );
251    }   //  CLIDefinition()
252
253        /*---------*\
254    ====** Methods **==========================================================
255        \*---------*/
256    /**
257     *  Returns the optional format.
258     *
259     *  @return An instance of
260     *      {@link Optional}
261     *      that holds the format.
262     *
263     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#format()
264     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#format()
265     */
266    public final Optional<String> format() { return m_Format; }
267
268    /**
269     *  Returns the sort key for the option or argument.
270     *
271     *  @return The sort key.
272     */
273    public abstract String getSortKey();
274
275    /**
276     *  Returns the handler.
277     *
278     *  @return The handler
279     */
280    public final CmdLineValueHandler<?> handler() { return m_Handler; }
281
282    /**
283     *  Returns a flag that indicates whether this is the definition for an
284     *  argument or an option.
285     *
286     *  @return {@code true} if this instance of {@code OptionDef} is defined
287     *      by an
288     *      {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument &#64;Argument}
289     *      annotation, {@code false} if it is defined by an
290     *      {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option &#64;Option}
291     *      annotation.
292     */
293    public final boolean isArgument() { return m_IsArgument; }
294
295    /**
296     *  Returns a flag that indicates whether this option or argument is
297     *  multi-valued.
298     *
299     *  @return {@code true} if multi-valued, {@code false}
300     *      otherwise.
301     */
302    public final boolean isMultiValued() { return m_IsMultiValued; }
303
304    /**
305     *  The name of the meta variable.
306     *
307     *  @return The meta variable.
308     */
309    public final String metaVar() { return m_MetaVar; }
310
311    /**
312     *  Processes the given parameter(s).
313     *
314     *  @param  params  A reference to the command line arguments as for this
315     *      option or argument definition. This method can use this object to
316     *      access the values if necessary. The object is valid only during the
317     *      method call.
318     *  @return The number of command line arguments consumed by this method.
319     *      For example, it will return 0 if option defined by this instance
320     *      does not take any parameters.
321     *  @throws CmdLineException    Parsing the parameter(s) failed.
322     */
323    public final int processParameters( final Parameters params ) throws CmdLineException
324    {
325        final var retValue = m_Handler.parseCmdLine( params );
326
327        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
328        return retValue;
329    }   //  processParameters()
330
331    /**
332     *  Returns the property name for this CLI element.
333     *
334     *  @return The property name.
335     */
336    public final String propertyName() { return m_Property; }
337
338    /**
339     *  Returns a flag indicating if the option or argument is mandatory.
340     *
341     *  @return {@code true} if the argument or option is required,
342     *      {@code false} otherwise.
343     *
344     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument#required()
345     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Option#required()
346     */
347    public final boolean required() { return m_IsRequired; }
348
349    /**
350     *  {@inheritDoc}<br>
351     */
352    @Override
353    public abstract String toString();
354
355    /**
356     *  Returns the usage text.
357     *
358     *  @return An instance of
359     *      {@link Optional}
360     *      that holds the usage text.
361     */
362    public final Optional<String> usage() { return m_Usage; }
363
364    /**
365     *  Returns the resource key for the usage text.
366     *
367     *  @return An instance of
368     *      {@link Optional}
369     *      that holds the key for the usage text.
370     */
371    public final Optional<String> usageKey() { return m_UsageKey; }
372
373    /**
374     *  Checks whether the given name for a command line option is valid.
375     *
376     *  @param  name    The intended name for the command line option.
377     *  @return {@code true} if the given name is valid, {@code false}
378     *      otherwise.
379     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given name is invalid.
380     */
381    @SuppressWarnings( "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass" )
382    public static final boolean validateOptionName( final String name ) throws IllegalArgumentException
383    {
384        final var retValue = switch( requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" ).length() )
385        {
386            case 0 ->  throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_EmptyIsInvalid, true ) );
387            case 1 ->
388            {
389                if( name.equals( LEAD_IN ) )
390                {
391                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_InvalidName, true, LEAD_IN ) );
392                }
393                throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_WrongLeadIn, true, LEAD_IN, name ) );
394            }
395
396            case 2 ->
397            {
398                if( name.equals( LEAD_IN + LEAD_IN ) )
399                {
400                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_ReservedName, true, LEAD_IN + LEAD_IN ) );
401                }
402                else if( !name.startsWith( LEAD_IN ) )
403                {
404                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_WrongLeadIn, true, LEAD_IN, name ) );
405                }
406                else if( isWhitespace( name.charAt( 1 ) ) )
407                {
408                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_Whitespace1, true, LEAD_IN ) );
409                }
410                yield true;
411            }
412
413            default ->
414            {
415                if( !name.startsWith( LEAD_IN + LEAD_IN ) )
416                {
417                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_WrongLeadIn, true, LEAD_IN + LEAD_IN, name ) );
418                }
419                else if( name.codePoints().anyMatch( Character::isWhitespace ) )
420                {
421                    throw new IllegalArgumentException( retrieveMessage( MSGKEY_Whitespace2, true ) );
422                }
423                yield true;
424            }
425        };
426
427        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
428        return retValue;
429    }   //  validateOptionName()
430}
431//  class CLIDefinition
432
433/*
434 *  End of File
435 */
